English: not to hear, not to question (idiom)
francais: se boucher les yeux et les oreilles

d.f: `置身事外~，`漠不關心~。《`兒女英雄傳~．`緣起~`首~`回~》：「`除~`了~`選~`色~`徵~`歌~`之外~，`一概~`付~`之~`不聞不問~。」`也~`作~「`不問~`不~`聞~」。

English: not to hear, not to question (idiom)
to show no interest in sth
francais: se boucher les yeux et les oreilles
